name: Virtue and Cinnamon
description:
What's this then?

Admiral Franciss Slouten and his right-hand man Han van Harento have come upon a mystical new good that's about to turn their whole world upside down. Deliver cinnamon to the good trading cities of the West Quemdan greater colonial empire as fast as possible and see riches beyond your wildest dreams!

Created in three days for Mini Jam 108 as a solo project!


Controls

WASD/left stick - make boat vroom vroom
